net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.locale

Class LocalizationRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.ComponentImpl
      • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.Label

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Component>, LocaleContextSource, Component, ListCellRenderer, TableCellRenderer, TreeCellRenderer

    public class LocalizationRenderer
extends Label
    Component that renders a LocalizedObjectKey.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getCellValueAsText

        @Nonnull
protected TextSource getCellValueAsText(@Nullable
                                    java.lang.Object value)
        Description copied from class: Label
        Get the String representation of a cell value. Override this method to customize how a cell value is displayed. This method is called from all cell renderer methods. It is called from the Label.validate() method so the component is attached.

        Support exists for the following value types.

        • NULL
        • *NamedObject
        • Date
        • Collection
        • Arrays

        Overrides:
        getCellValueAsText in class Label
        Parameters:
        value - the cell value.
        Returns:
        text.

                               java.util.Locale fallbackLocale)
        Get an instance for the specified arguments.
        Parameters:
        fallbackKey - the fallback key.
        fallbackFormatterArguments - optional formatter arguments for the fallback key.
        fallbackLocale - optional fallback locale for the fallback key.
        Returns:
        the renderer.

      • setLocalizationProvider

        public LocalizationRenderer setLocalizationProvider(Function<Pair<LocaleContext,LocalizedObjectKey>,LocalizedText> localizationProvider)
        Set the localization provider. The provider may return null for the localization, in which case, the default localization will be returned.
        Parameters:
        localizationProvider - the localization provider.
        Returns:
        this.
